definition: (of a person's manner or character) gentle and quiet

sentences.english: " Look at the quiet reserved Zhou Bichang Break how "happy camp "?
sentences.chinese: 看文静内敛的周笔畅如何玩转《快乐大本营》？

sentences.english: Our neighbor, Mae was a tall slender woman with a quiet, sincere demeanor.
sentences.chinese: 我们的邻居，梅姨，个子高挑，苗条，文静，直率。

sentences.english: The boy friend Guo Jing of colourful Ling is a net swim stylist, natural disposition is gentle and quiet.
sentences.chinese: 艳玲的男朋友郭静是个网游设计师，生性文静。

sentences.english: One sister was fair-haired and she was rather quiet and gentle.
sentences.chinese: 一个是金黄色头发，而且相当文静。

sentences.english: I am gentle, work methodically, is an individuality Gwynne and woman.
sentences.chinese: 我文静，做事有条不紊，是一个。

sentences.english: Silence is the best ornament of a woman.
British writer Graham Greenes The Quiet American is the magnum opus of his political novels.
sentences.chinese: 格林的《文静的美国人》是他政治小说的代表作。

sentences.english: She is a quiet girl born in a quiet village.
sentences.chinese: 她是一个文静的女孩，出生于一个僻静的村庄。

sentences.english: Hello everyone! My name is Guo Wenjing, and I am 10 years old.
sentences.chinese: 大家好，我的名字叫郭文静，今年10岁。

sentences.english: My best friend is a Fan Lin, she was more quiet than I am.
sentences.chinese: 我最好的朋友是范琳，她比我文静多了。

definition: pleasant/agreeable/a person after one's heart (charming person)/a gifted person
cultured and refined (idiom); gentle and cultivated
(of one's conduct, speech etc) natural and unrestrained
spacious and well-lit/open and clear/(of character) optimistic/cheerful/carefree
